name: I doesn't exist
description:
______________________________________________________________

A game about isolation, control and distraction in the form of a modern text-adventure. Discover what lies behind the door and solve puzzles to slowly reveal the truth of this forest.

-------------This game is currently in development-------------

-----If you find bugs please contact us at lual@lual.games-----

______________________________________________________________

Controls

Keyboard only! 

______________________________________________________________

______________________________________________________________

We are creating this game as a bachelor project and would love your feedback! To fill out a short form click here!

Created together with:

  • Anna-Lena Pontet (tookfoolery)   - code, narration
  • Luzia Hüttenmoser (lulatschia)   - art, code, narration
  • Paul Schmidt (paultaroschmidt)   - composer, sound design
  • Jonas Füllemann (jonasfüllemann) - composer, sound design
